Author: DoingBetterForMyself
Text: Never been caught but also not really trying terribly hard to hide it. I'd probably just tell them if they caught me.

Author: artsypear
Text: ive been caught and couldnt really hide it because “being sick w the flu” isnt a common occurence.   all i can give you is try to stop purging. :( its so bad for your health. it doesnt expell all the calories, causes acid reflux and heartburn regularly and also throws your body out of balance. you can also get seizures after a long time, and not to mention your teeth. :( please pm me if u need any help love.  purging isnt the way to go and hiding it is x10 harder when the health effects kick in
